Tutorials¶

If you are wondering how to start using MATRXS or just want to get some hands-on experience, the following tutorials might be where you want to start.

The basics¶

The Basics

BlocksWorld in MATRXS¶

Inspired by BlocksWorld for Teams (BW4T) the tutorials in this section serve as examples of scenarios that simulate teaming tasks in a block world.

BW4T

  • Part 1: BW4T skeleton
  • Part 2: BW4T action plan

Once more MATRXS tutorials are available, you can find them here.
